mapcontrollers

类 BasicInfoController

  • java.lang.Object
    • mapcontrollers.BasicInfoController
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class BasicInfoController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    Class acting as the BasicInfoView's controller, to define action performed according to different users' action.

    • 字段概要
